name: Yamawaro (山童)
description:
This wonderful NFT featured here are from a Japanese painted scroll known as the Bakemono zukushi. The artist and date is unknown, though its thought to hail from the Edo-period, sometime from the 18th or 19th century. Across it's length are depicted a ghoulish array of "yokai" from Japanese folklore.

Yamawaro (山童) is a one-eyed kappa-like creature found in the mountains.
